sn7.13:4.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā vātehābādhiko hoti;
sn7.13:4.3: āyasmā ca upavāṇo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hoti.
sn7.13:4.4: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ upavāṇaṃ āmantesi:
sn7.13:4.6: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā upavāṇo bhagavato paṭissutvā nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena devahitassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.13:4.8: Addasā kho devahito brāhmaṇo āyasmantaṃ upavāṇaṃ tuṇhībhūtaṃ ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ.
sn7.13:7.3: Apacito apaceyyānaṃ,
sn7.13:8.1: Atha kho devahito brāhmaṇo uṇhodakassa kājaṃ purisena gāhāpetvā phāṇitassa ca puṭaṃ āyasmato upavāṇassa pādāsi.
sn7.13:8.2: Atha kho āyasmā upavāṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.13:8.3: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ uṇhodakena nhāpetvā uṇhodakena phāṇitaṃ āloletvā bhagavato pādāsi.
sn7.13:9.1: Atha kho devahito brāhmaṇo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn7.13:9.3: Sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn7.13:9.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho devahito brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn7.13:13.1: Evaṃ vutte, devahito brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn7.13:13.3: upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatan”ti.
